Welcome to the world of manifold regression! In [part 2](https://matthew-parker.rbind.io/post/2020-03-02-manifold-regression-2/) we will apply manifold regression to a case study involving fMRI brain imaging data using R and [MGLMRiem](https://github.com/mrparker909/MGLMRiem). See [part 1](https://matthew-parker.rbind.io/post/2020-01-19-manifold-regression-1/) for an introduction to these models.

[Read full post](https://matthew-parker.rbind.io/post/2020-03-02-manifold-regression-2/)
